title: Chat App
description: A real-time chat application built with the MERN stack (MongoDB, Express.js, React, and Node.js), developed as part of my journey to learn web development.

title: Book Tracker App
description: Memorabillia is a book tracker app aimed at enhancing reader engagement by leveraging progress tracking and personalized recommendations.

title: Book Inventory App
description: A simple book inventory management system (CRUD) built with the MERN stack (MongoDB, Express, React, Node.js) to learn full-stack development fundamentals.
